title: Chat said my name was Blob?
body: I was playing as Camille, and randomly where it says yur champ name, it was replaced with 'Blob', just on one chat line. Why?

replies.body:
Was there a Lulu in the game by any chance?

If you type or ping etc, while Polymorphed, your name comes up different.
For example, if Winter Wonder Lulu polymorphous you, your name becomes snowman.
Sorry for the late reply - I don't think there was - I was top lane and pretty sure I've never versed a lulu top.
To add to what Sessh said, I'm pretty sure "blob" is specific to SG Lulu.
